com.weibo.sdk.android.keep
类 AccessTokenKeeper

java.lang.Object
  com.weibo.sdk.android.keep.AccessTokenKeeper

public class AccessTokenKeeper
extends java.lang.Object

该类用于保存Oauth2AccessToken到sharepreference，并提供读取功能

构造方法摘要
AccessTokenKeeper()
           
 
方法摘要
static void keepAccessToken(Context context, Oauth2AccessToken token)
          保存accesstoken到SharedPreferences
static Oauth2AccessToken readAccessToken(Context context)
          从SharedPreferences读取accessstoken
